medical_history.chief_complaint: Ms D wishes to donate a kidney to her mother who has end-stage renal disease.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Ms D's mother was diagnosed with diabetes and hypertension about 7 years ago, which eventually led to her kidneys failing. Ms D has been evaluated as a kidney donor and is preparing to donate.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Ms D has a history of Wolf-Parkinson-White syndrome, hypothyroidism, and removal of an ovarian cyst at age 18. She is currently overweight and has smoked a pack of cigarettes daily for 22 years but plans to quit smoking and lose weight before the transplant.
medical_history.family_history: Diabetes runs in Ms D's family.
medical_history.social_history: Ms D is a nursing student, lives in a metropolitan area, and has a history of smoking. She has a son aged 10. She plans to quit smoking and reduce her weight.
